channel.description: Recent content in Safety on FinanClub

item.title: CSX
item.description: score:-6 Chances: CSX is expanding its intermodal service in partnership with Georgia Ports Authority, potentially increasing revenue streams. CSX has affirmed its dividend of $0.11, which may be attractive to income-focused investors. CSX is committed to improving conductor training and safety after recent incidents, which could enhance its reputation.
